primary_contributor.name: Vincent Nguyen
primary_contributor.contribution: Created comprehensive Vietnamese orthographic-phonetic mappings for the Saigon dialect, including all vowel tone variations and consonant realizations. Compiled 99 orthogon entries with example words, pronunciations, and contextual usage patterns.

contributors.name: Claude (Anthropic)
contributors.contribution: Reformatted data for OMOD schema compliance, completed example pronunciations and meanings, standardized IPA notation, and provided linguistic annotations.

sources.title: Vietnamese alphabet
sources.author: Wikipedia contributors
sources.notes: General reference for Vietnamese orthography and pronunciation patterns

sources.title: Vietnamese Typography
sources.notes: Specialized resource for Vietnamese alphabet and typography

sources.title: vPhon
sources.author: James Kirby
sources.notes: Vietnamese phonetization tool and reference for IPA transcription patterns

sources.title: Glottolog: Vietnamese
sources.author: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology

sources.title: Saigon Dialect Documentation
sources.author: Vincent Nguyen
sources.notes: Original fieldwork and documentation of Southern Vietnamese pronunciation patterns

notes: This dataset represents the Saigon (Southern Vietnamese) dialect specifically. Pronunciation patterns may differ significantly from Northern (Hanoi) and Central (Huáº¿) dialects. Data excludes English loanwords and focuses on traditional Vietnamese vocabulary. Future versions may include additional dialectal variants and expanded contextual information.
